title: Government launches new education policy
text: The government has launched a new education policy focusing on skill development and digital learning.

title: Aliens found living among humans
text: A viral post claims that aliens are secretly living among humans which is completely false.

title: Scientists discover cure for cancer
text: Researchers have discovered a new treatment that shows promise in curing cancer after years of trials.

title: Drinking salt water cures all diseases
text: A message spreading online says drinking salt water can cure all diseases which is not scientifically proven.

text: A new technology has been developed that improves battery life in smartphones and electric vehicles.

title: Earth will end tomorrow scientists say
text: Social media posts claim that scientists say earth will end tomorrow which has no scientific basis.

text: Local farmers are happy as a new government scheme helps them with financial support.

title: Miracle pill makes people immortal

title: Fake currency notes printed at home
text: False messages are spreading that fake currency notes can be printed easily at home.
